scripts.build: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/ && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug && echo 'apk in android/app/build/outputs/apk/debug/app-debug'
scripts.release: cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && echo 'apk in android/app/build/outputs/apk
